title: Pounding waves
content:
Pounding waves echoed my screams
From our dwelling, primordial love cries
Echoing lightening skies
Yellow struck among redwood beams
My passion is as it seems
Dripping liquids from bodies sighs
Natural blood came from your body's
Cavity, I sang our moss grown rocks
As rhythms that never mock
Flesh's spirit's energy red
My love that's never dead
